text: After many years away from campus life am super glad to be part of this institution. A very nice campus albeit not that big. Facilities are very well kept and efficient. Always happy to be back on campus.

Comprehensive campus with residence facilities for executive education. Compact location that's right next to the MRT station. Friendly staff. Great place to conduct your company's executive education or sign up for one if you're an individual. The INSEAD online network tools are great.
Very clean and comfortable environment to study and work. Skyrise greenery with lots of sustainability and green Initatives.

Excellent Infrastructure and facilities. Teaching faculty is world class. Superb teaching method. State of the Art class rooms with the latest technological gadgets and inputs. Location is easily accessible. Collection of books in library is good. Good souvenir shop too. Truly marketed as Business school of the world.
